name: Sport Runner
description:
Endless Randomly generated Track Runner in a low res pixelated style.  

Be sure to keep up with the track or otherwise it will degenerate before you and you will fall off lol.

Controls

WSAD/Arrow keys to drive car

R to reset scene {Will Throw a new seed for the track so it always at least somewhat different 0-9999 possible seeds)

C to change Camera 

Esc to get to the pause menu{does not currently freeze the game}

Hope you guys enjoy 

track Dev progress here:https://trello.com/b/KVlMkcp9/sport-runner-dev-progress

Used assets:


Car:https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/low-poly-cars-101798

Trackgen{Modified it to give random seeds}https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/trackgen-a-procedural-tr...
